backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to update the Contact Me button to open a Gmail compose URL.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, index.css, and tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer overriding theme tokens and applying light/dark mode variables with background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering a styled portfolio with hero, about, skills, projects, education, and contact sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider handling Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Psychedelic-themed Tailwind CSS variables and global styles with layered backgrounds and neon color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry file setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, animations, and utility classes using OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state and requirements for building Consuelo Ayalaâ€™s resume/portfolio website, including sections, constraints, and linked art/food project content. Lists existing features, architectural notes, and project metadata.
